ozpIwc.Client Class

Uses
  • ozpIwc.ApiPromiseMixin
Defined in: app/js/client/client.js:8
Module: client

This class will be heavily modified in the future.

Constructor

ozpIwc.Client

(
  • config
)

Defined in app/js/client/client.js:8

Parameters:

  • config Object
    • peerUrl String
      • Base URL of the peer server
    • params Object
      • Parameters that will be passed to the bus.
      • log String
        - The IWC bus logging level. One of "NONE","DEFAULT","ERROR","INFO","DEBUG", or "ALL"
    • [autoConnect=true] Boolean optional
      • Whether to automatically find and connect to a peer
  • Index
  • Methods
  • Properties
  • Events

Item Index

Methods

  • connect
  • createIframePeer
  • disconnect

Properties

  • configUrl the url(s) to connect the client on. If function, the output of the!~YUIDOC_LINE~! function will be used.
  • connectPromise
  • peerUrlCheck

Events

  • #gotAddress

Methods

connect

()

Defined in app/js/client/client.js:82

Connects the client from the IWC bus. Fires:

- ozpIwc.Client/#connected

createIframePeer

()

Defined in app/js/client/client.js:143

Creates an invisible iFrame Peer for IWC bus communication.

disconnect

()

Defined in app/js/client/client.js:63

Disconnects the client from the IWC bus.

Properties

configUrl the url(s) to connect the client on. If function, the output of the!~YUIDOC_LINE~! function will be used.

String | Array | Function

Defined in app/js/client/client.js:29

Generates the Peer URL checking logic based on the data type received.

Defined in app/js/client/client.js:93
